displayName: Scotts® Turf Builder® Starter® Food For New Grass (FL)
benefits: Grows new grass 70% thicker, 35% quicker versus unfed grass; Gets new grass off to a quick start by promoting faster root and blade development; 22-24-4 fertilizer ratio provides the nutrients for developing lawns; Improves seeding results! Also great for sod and grass plugs; For use on all grass types
howToApply:
Lawn products work in harmony with the environment when used correctly. Do not apply near water or storm drains or draining ditches. Do not apply if heavy rain is expected. Apply with a drop or rotary spreader. For best results, use a Scotts® spreader.

  1. Set spreader to appropriate setting for best results. Spreader settings can be found on back of bag or on Scotts.com. Follow the color coded map to ensure your lawn receives the right amount of fertilizer. Apply as directed.
  2. Fill spreader and apply over newly seeded area or over entire lawn for root development.
  3. To keep lawn products from reaching storm sewers, sweep or blow stray particles back onto lawn. Return unused portion of fertilizer to original container. Run any remaining product out of spreader over lawn.
  4. This product does not require watering in. However, watering is the critical step to seeding success. Keep soil consistently moist until seedlings reach 2 inches high.

displayName: Scotts® Turf Builder® Thick'R Lawn® Bermudagrass
benefits: Scotts® Turf Builder® Thick'R Lawn® Bermudagrass is a 3-in-1 solution of grass seed, fertilizer, and soil improverSeed to fill gaps in your lawn, fertilizer for thicker grass, and soil improver for enhanced root development. Helps you get up to a 50% thicker lawn (subject to proper care; results may vary based on current condition of lawn). Easily apply in late spring or early summer with a Scotts Spreader. Covers 4,000 sq. ft.
howToApply:
Grow bermuda grass with this 3-in-1 solution of grass seed, fertilizer, and soil improver.

  1. Prepare the area to be seeded by mowing to a height of 2 inches, or at the lowest spreader setting.
  2. Rake or dethatch the lawn to loosen the top layer of soil and remove any debris. Apply Scotts® Turf Builder® Thick'R Lawn® Bermudagrass with a Scotts® spreader.
  3. Water daily, or as needed, to keep soil surface moist for the first 2 weeks until seedlings germinate, then water regularly to maintain seedling growth.

One 40 lb. bag covers 4,000 sq. ft. of lawn

displayName: Scotts® Turf Builder® Southern Lawn Food
benefits: Use Scotts® Turf Builder® Southern Lawn Food to build a strong, thick southern lawn that helps protect it from heat and drought. **In Florida? Use this version:Scotts® Turf Builder® Southern Lawn Food F.
howToApply:
Apply to a wet or dry lawn on a calm day. For best results, use a Scotts® spreader.

Apply only to actively growing turf. For even application walk at a steady pace slightly overlapping each pass. For fast results, lightly water in (product does not require watering in).

Apply this product only to your lawn and sweep any product that lands on the driveway, sidewalk, or street back onto your lawn. Return unused product to original container. Help keep our water clean. Do not apply near water, storm drains, or drainage ditches. Do not apply if heavy rain is expected. Lawn is safe to re-enter immediately after product is applied.

1. Scotts Broadcast Spreaders: Line up each pass approximately 5 ft. from wheel track.

2. Scotts Drop Spreaders: Align hopper arrow with previous wheel track.

3. Clean Up

displayName: Scotts® Turf Builder® Grass Seed Zoysia Grass Seed & Mulch
benefits: Scotts® Zoysia grass excels in heat, drought, partial shade, and colder temperatures. It provides excellent heat & drought tolerance and is the most cold tolerant warm season grass.
howToApply:
1. Rake area to loosen the top layer of soil and remove dead grass. For best results, add a thin layer of Scotts® Turf Builder® Lawn Soil before applying seed.

2. Apply using a Scotts® spreader. Lightly rake the seed into the soil. For best results, apply Scotts® Turf Builder® Starter® Food for New Grass when seeding to help new grass grow in quicker and thicker.

3. Watering is a critical step to seeding success. Water daily or as needed to keep the soil surface moist until the seedlings reach at least 2 inches tall.

4. Seed will begin to grow in 10 - 28 days. You can mow the seedlings when they reach 2 inches in height. Do not apply a weed control product until after at least four mowings.
coverageArea: 5 lb.: 2,000 sq. ft. for overseeding and 665 sq. ft. for new lawn coverage

displayName: Scotts® Turf Builder® Weed & Feed3
benefits:
The improved Scotts® Turf Builder® Weed & Feed? features Scotts newest technology in the fight against weeds. WeedGrip, Technology grips the weeds you see and the ones you don't.

This means up to 2X more powerful** dandelion and clover control, in fact it's guaranteed* to clear out dandelions and clover. It does all this while also feeding your lawn to build strong, deep roots to crowd out future weeds.

It's Scotts most powerful Weed & Feed ever!
howToApply:
1. If rain is in the forecast in the next 24 hours, apply another day. Rain can wash the particles off of weed leaves before it has a chance to work properly.

2. Use a Scotts® spreader to apply Scotts® Turf Builder® Weed & Feed. Check the spreader settings for the appropriate setting.

3. Make sure the grass is wet from dew or sprinkling before applying. This helps particles adhere to weed leaves to produce best results. For even application walk at a steady pace slightly overlapping each pass. After applying this product you don't water your lawn for at least 24 hours. Just like rain, watering your lawn after applying Weed & Feed washes the weed control particles off of weed leaves before they can fully work.

4. Sweep product from hard surfaces onto the lawn to keep valuable feeding nutrients on the grass and out of storm drains.

displayName: Scotts® Turf Builder® Thick'R Lawn TM Sun & Shade
benefits:
Scotts® Turf Builder® Thick'R Lawn TM Sun & Shade has everything you need to help turn weak, thin grass into a thick, green lawn. With this 3-in-1 solution, get up to a 50% thicker lawn with just one application*, guaranteed! Thick'R Lawn<sup>TM</sup> contains soil improver for enhanced root development, seed to fill gaps with new grass, and fertilizer to feed new grass and thicken and green existing turf. This product is intended for use on an entire lawn and can be applied easily with a Scotts® spreader.

*Subject to proper care. Results may vary based on current condition of lawn.
howToApply:
1. Mow the area to a height of approximately 2 inches or lowest mowing setting. Rake or de-thatch to loosen the top layer of soil and remove any dead grass or debris.

2. Use a Scotts® spreader to apply.

3. Water daily or as needed to keep soil surface moist for the first 2 weeks. Resume mowing when lawn reaches desired mowing height.

2. Use a Scotts® spreader to apply.

3. Water daily or as needed to keep soil surface moist for the first 2 weeks. Resume mowing when lawn reaches desired mowing height.

• Go over lawn TWO times

disposalMethod: If empty do not reuse contain. Place in trash or offer for recycling if available. If partly filled, call your local solid waste agency for disposal instructions. Never place unused product down any indoor or outdoor drain.
description: Scotts® Turf Builder® Thick'R Lawn TM Tall Fescue Mix has everything you need to help turn weak, thin grass into a thicker, greener lawn, guaranteed!

displayName: Scotts® Turf Builder® Bonus® S Southern Weed & FeedF2
benefits:
Scotts® Turf Builder® Bonus® S Southern Weed & Feed? will not only kill weeds, but also thicken your lawn to help crowd out future weeds.

Regular feedings provide the nutrients your lawn needs to look its best and withstand the stresses of heat, drought and family activity.

Bonus® S may be used on St. Augustinegrass (including Floratam), Centipede, Zoysia and Carpetgrass lawns.

Apply when grass and weeds are actively growing.

Only available in Florida.

Do not apply by hand or hand-held rotary devices such as hand-held rotary applicator.

displayName: Scotts® Turf Builder® THICK'R Lawn™ Sun & Shade
benefits:
Scotts® Turf Builder® THICK'R Lawn™ Sun & Shade has everything you need to help turn weak, thin grass into a thick, green lawn. With this 3-in-1 solution get up to a 50% thicker lawn with just one application*, guaranteed! THICK'R Lawn contains soil improver for enhanced root development, seed to fill gaps with new grass, and fertilizer to feed new grass and thicken and green existing turf. This product is intended for use on an entire lawn and can be applied easily with a Scotts® spreader.

*Subject to proper care. Results may vary based on current condition of lawn.
howToApply:
1. Mow the area to a height of approximately 2 inches or lowest mowing setting. Rake or de-thatch to loosen the top layer of soil and remove any dead grass or debris.

2. Use a Scotts® spreader to apply.

3. Water daily or as needed to keep soil surface moist for the first 2 weeks. Resume mowing when lawn reaches desired mowing height.

displayName: Gro® 7 Zone Controller
benefits: Simplify your life with the power of smart watering. Gro® 7 Zone Controller automatically adjusts your watering schedule based on real time local weather data. The result is a custom irrigation plan tailored for your lawn that can be monitored from anywhere, at any time. The Gro Connect app, available on Android & iOS, let's you fully control your watering schedule, turn the system on or off, and more. The Gro® 7 Zone Controller is for indoor installation only. Compatible only with locations in the continental United States.
howToApply:
1. Replace your old sprinkler controller.

2. Download the Gro™ Connect App.

3. Connect to your Wi-Fi.
description: Simplify your life with the power of smart watering. Gro® 7 Zone Controller automatically adjusts your watering schedule based on real time local weather data.

displayName: Scotts® Turf Builder® EdgeGuard® Mini Broadcast Spreader
benefits: Spread product efficiently and effectively with Scotts® Turf Builder® EdgeGuard® Mini Broadcast Spreader. Equipped with Scotts® exclusive EdgeGuard® Technology, you can trust that the product you spread will be spread accurately. You can even control the panel’s precision rate setting to deliver more accurate coverage on up to 5,000 sq. ft. The Scotts® Turf Builder® EdgeGuard® Mini Spreader comes calibrated and ready to use, so you can get started right away.
howToApply:
1. Turn rate control to correct setting listed on the back of each Scotts product.

2. Make sure spreader width is 5 feet so allow a few feet in between passes to ensure even distribution.

3. When Edgeguard® is engaged it will block off right side of spreader pattern to prevent product from spreading onto non-lawns areas
description: Spread product efficiently and effectively with Scotts® Turf Builder® EdgeGuard® Mini Broadcast Spreader.

displayName: Scotts® Turf Builder® Southern Lawn Food F
benefits: Formulated for Florida lawns. Feeds and strengthens the lawn against heat, drought and wear and tear. Kid and pet friendly. Not in Florida? Use this version: Scotts® Turf Builder® Southern Lawn Food.
howToApply:
Apply to a wet or dry lawn on a calm day. For best results, use a Scotts® spreader.

Apply only to actively growing turf. For even application walk at a steady pace slightly overlapping each pass. For fast results, lightly water in (product does not require watering in).

Apply this product only to your lawn and sweep any product that lands on the driveway, sidewalk, or street back onto your lawn. Return unused product to original container. Help keep our water clean. Do not apply near water, storm drains, or drainage ditches. Do not apply if heavy rain is expected.

Lawn is safe to re-enter immediately after product is applied.
spreaderSettings:
Scotts® Broadcast/Rotary Spreader

shelfLife: Dry fertilizer products (without pesticide controls) have an indefinite shelf life.
description: Feeds and strengthens Florida lawns against heat and drought.
